CARDINAL . The relevant law and practice regarding the expropriation of private property for public use has been summarised in the judgment of PERSON and Others v. GPE ( nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , DATE and CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . In DATE ORG adopted the PERSON on ORG ( ORG за възстановяване на собствеността върху някои отчуждени имоти по ORG , ORG , ORG , ORG и ЗС , “ the DATE LAW ” ) which provided for the restitution of expropriated property where specific conditions were met .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the DATE LAW provides that upon the revocation of an expropriation , any property received in compensation by the claimant shall pass to the municipality by virtue of the ruling or judgment ordering the revocation . Any amounts paid by an owner who had received restitution , to cover the difference between the value of an expropriated property and any property received as compensation , are to be reimbursed by the authorities within DATE of the date of the ruling or judgment granting the restitution ( section CARDINAL § CARDINAL ) .
